## Introduction

This repo contains R code and R markdown documents for the 'Statistical Inference' course project, as part of the data science specialization from Johns Hopkins through Coursera.

There are 2 parts to the course project

- The first  investigate the exponential distribution in R and compare it with the Central Limit Theorem;

- The second part analyze the ToothGrowth data in the R datasets package;
